entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
